{{also|生米煮成熟饭}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=生米煮成熟饭}}

===Etymology===
Literally: the raw rice has already been cooked

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=shēng mǐ zhǔ chéng 熟 fàn
|cat=id
}}

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# a metaphor for when something is already inevitable, and there is no way to reverse it; there is no turning back; what's done is done; you can't turn back the clock
#: [[這]][[件]][[事]][[已經]]'''生米煮成熟飯'''[[了]]，[[你]][[應該]][[勇敢]][[的]][[面對]][[現實]]，[[思量]][[解決]][[之]][[道]]。
#: '''''What's done is done'''. You should bravely face reality, and think of a solution.''

[[zh:生米煮成熟飯]]
